mapper.update: update user set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, main_station = #{mainStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, github_address = #{gitHubAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resume = #{resume,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grade = #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, main_station,github_address,img, info, email, `password`, resume, grade, student_id from user
